name: Wizard Forts
description:
Wizard Forts (tentative title) is a co-operative top-down, multiplayer, tower defense/action RPG hybrid based on the Kodo Tag Warcraft III mod.

Please don't download this if you have any expectations of having fun. There's nothing fun to do... yet! <3

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • L spawns slimes
  • Click to fireball
  • Space to place a crate
  • B to build a pillar
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in and out
  • And other shortcuts I'm probably forgetting

I stream development of the game whenever I can and I feel like it on Twitch at https://twitch.tv/lytedev, so feel free to follow me there if the development in particular is interesting to you.
